IDC InfoBrief: Driving Agility in the ASEAN Public Sector
 

 

While ASEAN public sector organizations are moving to the cloud, the pace of
cloud migration and modernization varies between the countries. Find out more
about the cloud journey that different ASEAN nations are undertaking, the
challenges of modernization, and best practices.

Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Intel have developed this InfoBrief with research
by IDC for ASEAN public sector organizations to dive deep into how they can
realize the cloud's full potential.

 

 

Download the IDC InfoBrief
[https://vmxwvcrs.r.us-east-1.awstrack.me/L0/https:%2F%2Femail.awscloud.com%2FMTEyLVRaTS03NjYAAAGNxHlyO0cZSAB6i194T3SlwbKZyu7mgI6qbmuRNK13mMvR7quMP9EEnmd8p61bQSOE02W-Cv8=/2/0100018a2580dd85-9bfabb39-3ed3-4a21-bc76-ed3af1a99960-000000/SsUKCD1EPQtRStijH5eeOwWz0fg=336]

Amazon Web Services Team
